snippet: The Yankees obtained Chris Martin from the Rockies for cash. Martin, 28, made his big-league debut last April and had a 6.89 earned run average over 16 relief appearances.
abstract: New York Yankees acquire pitching prospect Chris Martin from the Colorado Rockies in cash deal; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees obtained Chris Martin from the Rockies for cash. Martin, 28, made his big-league debut last April and had a 6.89 earned run average over 16 relief appearances.
